titleStmt.title: Otto Tachenius his Hippocrates chymicus discovering the ancient foundation of the late viperine salt with his Clavis thereunto annexed translated by J.W.
Antiquissimae Hipprocraticae medicinae clavis. English.
titleStmt.author: Tachenius, Otto, d. ca. 1670.
J. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and are to be sold by W: Marshall at the Bible in Newgate Street,

notesStmt.note: Translation of author's Antiquissimae Hipprocraticae medicinae clavis.
"Otto Tachenius his Clavis to the antient Hippocratical physick" has a separate dated title page, pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
